author: king process
description:
A Man Who Traps Flowing Light to Make a Staircase? Korea’s Resin Staircase Where Emotion Meets Craft

A resin staircase project commissioned by a subscriber.
A choice that began with a resin table now becomes a real staircase inside a home.
The resin craftsman says he never makes the same thing—only one-of-one pieces.
Watch how a staircase that seems to trap flowing light transforms the entire space.
